Title: Crystals in the Water
Description:
We might not look it this moment, but we are professionals. The Expedition entrusted us with finding a clutch of rare crystals in the area--a geological survey if you will.

I'm still collecting myself after the gorloc attack. Would you be a dear and go look for these crystals? Bring samples back if you can.
ObjectivesText: Collect 4 Crystal Samples in Gorloc Shore.
RewardText: Excellent work! I'll get this to LOU-C and see what her little contraption can make of it.
